    • sort_and_filter

      public static ArrayList<Item> sort_and_filter(ArrayList<Item> list, int sorting_option, boolean ascending, int filter_option, String date_from, String date_to)
      Sorts and filters the given list of items based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of items to be sorted and filtered.
      sorting_option - The sorting option (e.g., R.id.date_sort_button).
      ascending - True if sorting should be in ascending order, false otherwise.
      filter_option - The filter option (e.g., R.id.date_from).
      date_from - The starting date for filtering.
      date_to - The ending date for filtering.
      Returns:
      The sorted and filtered list of items.

    • sort

      Sorts the given list of items based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of items to be sorted.
      sorting_option - The sorting option (e.g., R.id.date_sort_button).
      ascending - True if sorting should be in ascending order, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The sorted list of items.

    • filter

      Filters the given list of items based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of items to be filtered.
      filter_option - The filter option (e.g., R.id.date_from).
      date_from - The starting date for filtering.
      date_to - The ending date for filtering.
      Returns:
      The filtered list of items.
